applicationId.description: The application ID of the application registration within the referenced AAD tenant.

clientSecret.description: The client secret generated for the above app ID in AAD.

directoryId.description: The directory ID corresponding to the Azure Active Directory (AAD) tenant of the application.

federatedTokenFile.description: Specifically useful for workload identity federation.
federatedTokenFile.title: Location of the file containing a federated token.
